content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of 9 building blocks arranged in 5 layers:
- Bottom layer (Layer 1): 1 red block with three arches
- Layer 2: 1 green rectangular block
- Layer 3: 1 red block with a single arch
- Layer 4: 2 green vertical rectangular blocks side by side
- Layer 5: 1 yellow horizontal rectangular block with 1 orange triangular roof-like block on top

## Spatial Relationships
- Bottom layer: A red block with three arches (block #2) forms the base
- Second layer: A green horizontal rectangular block (block #7) sits on top of the red base
- Third layer: A red block with a single arch (block #3) sits centered on the green block
- Fourth layer: Two green vertical rectangular blocks (both block #6) stand side by side on the red arch block
- Top layer: A yellow horizontal rectangular block (block #9) spans across the two green vertical blocks
- A triangular orange roof-like block (block #15) sits on top of the yellow block

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the analysis, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:
- Block #2: Red block with three arches (used once)
- Block #3: Red block with a single arch (used once) 
- Block #6: Green vertical rectangular block (used twice)
- Block #7: Green horizontal rectangular block (used once)
- Block #9: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (used once)
- Block #15: Orange triangular block (used once)

# Assembly Order

{
  Step1: Move block with index 2
  Step2: Move block with index 7
  Step3: Move block with index 3
  Step4: Move block with index 6
  Step5: Move block with index 6
  Step6: Move block with index 9
  Step7: Move block with index 15
}
